title: That took long enough
author: VD
content_html: I thought the full text of the final Harry Potter book would be available in one of my preferred formats two days ago, but better late than never. It’s just as well, I probably won’t get around to reading it until next week since I’m hoping to wrap up the first draft of TIA on Monday.
content_text: I thought the full text of the final Harry Potter book would be available in one of my preferred formats two days ago, but better late than never.  It’s just as well, I probably won’t get around to reading it until next week since I’m hoping to wrap up the first draft of TIA on Monday.
